author: chinnant
title: A good little polybag with a nice printed piece.
review:
I was lucky enough to find one of these at Target, stuffed behind some Star Wars sets. I had seen Just2Good review it, and wanted to get one myself, to add to my city's growing fire fighting squad. 

I was pleasantly surprised to see that this set had a quite nice and very useful printed 2x2 slope piece with the modern day City subtheme fire logo. I will be using this piece in later mocs.

Other then that, I like the inclusion of a trash can, as my city population could always use another place to store their trash. The mini figure is basic, but still nice. 

I give this set a 9/10. For only 4 US dollars, you get a nice printed piece, and trash can, and a good assortment of red pieces.
